      • readFile

        public void readFile(java.lang.String filePath)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Loads all Phrases from file to phraseList.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Patch to file from Phrases will be loaded.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When there is a reading problem.
